layout.name: blockID
layout.title: Block
layout.tooltip: Which block is used to form the bridge.

layout.name: startRotation
layout.title: Start Rotation
layout.tooltip: The rotation (in degrees) that the platform starts at when spawned.

layout.name: rotationChange
layout.title: Rotation Change
layout.tooltip: The amount that the rotation changes (in degrees) each time it extends.

layout.name: moveDuration
layout.title: Move Duration
layout.tooltip: The amount of time it takes for the bridge to extend/retract (in frames).

layout.name: waitDuration
layout.title: Wait Duration
layout.tooltip: The amount of time it waits after extending or retracting (in frames).

layout.name: amountLeft
layout.title: Amount on Left
layout.tooltip: The number of blocks on the left side (at a 0 degree tilt).

layout.name: amountRight
layout.title: Amount on Right
layout.tooltip: The number of blocks on the right side (at a 0 degree tilt).

layout.name: blockGap
layout.title: Block Gap
layout.tooltip: The gap between each block (in pixels).

layout.name: startExtended
layout.title: Start Extended
layout.tooltip: If checked, the platform will spawn already extended.
